name: Device #2 // Chromatic Flow
description:
The second of my Device series. This device is loaded with chromatic flow simulator. The simulator is running on the device's minimal 98x98 display, however the device itself is rendered at your browser's resolution. 

Controls: 
 - Left click / 1 finger touch to generate chromatic data on the device. 
 - Right click / 2 finger touch to rotate the device. 
 - Scroll to move the device. 
Stop moving the device to let it reset to the default view.

Notes: 
 - Not tested with fullscreen.
 - May take a few seconds for the performance to improve and stabilize on mobile devices.
